website_summaries.verdict: Great Bluetooth-enabled headphones, providing superior audio quality at an affordable price.
pros: Compact, sleek-looking earphones designed for comfort, stability, and superior audio quality
Great option for those not comfortable opting for wireless buds
cons: Some customers experience problems with earphones falling out during exercise

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR GYM OR ANY SORT OF WORKOUT
customer_reviews.text: The wires are too short, making the plastic piece that goes behind your neck swing around every time you move. They will not stay in place during working out. Also, the materials are very poor - the charging cover broke on the second charge. Sound quality is good, but what’s the point if they are impossible to wear in gym?!
customer_reviews.author: Kris U.

customer_reviews.title: Weak battery life
customer_reviews.text: This battery died in about 3 hours. That's ridiculous for a $90 device. I primarily used it for talking. I could hear fine although the caller was slightly low but not enough to complain. No complaints from callers about hearing me. I don't remember the range, I don't want to give inaccurate info by guessing. The fit was really good. It's small which is good for my small ears. Decent seal. It hung nicely. I liked except for the battery life... but that's major. It could have been defective but I honestly didn't feel like going through the motions, just returned it while it was in the 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!!! Very low volume!
customer_reviews.text: My $20 Mpows are much better, louder, connect and stay connected longer. I thought AKG was a good brand. Well their earbuds are good quality. But these bluetooth ones are horrible. I can hear the wind blowing the leaves outside with these on. The volume just sucks! I'm used to earbuds being a lot louder. And out of all of my bluetooth earbuds, this was by far the worst!!!! Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Djmeechymeech

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and performance, *UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, after a very long run it does tend to falll out once sweat allows it to slip from your ear but that's probably normal. *UPDATE: almost two months after using these they have started to cut-out during use. There's static that comes through the music and then pauses, eventually cutting out. I've noticed that trying to shut down and restart doesn't work. I have to wait hours before they will work again, only to cut out after 30 minutes of use again.
customer_reviews.author: checo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Great battery life Decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice and sound nice. Wish they were alittle louder or blocked out noise alittle better. Has a feature to hear your surroundings threw the ear buds, Assume that would be good for a runner but wish it was a noise canceling instead. Overall very nice headphones. The akg ear buds that come with samsung phones are still my favorite and think they sound better than these but these still sound very nice just not as loud as i would have liked.. battery life is great on these and charge super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is the worst I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The sound from the earbuds are fine but the microphone is terrible. I mean really, really bad. Lucky I only paid $30 for these when they were on special as I can't return them being in Australia. I would hate to pay $99 for earbuds with such a bad microphone. I tested recordings on both my laptop and phone and it's like I was talking into a potato. I could not believe how bad it was. I'll probably throw these out as I needed these for listening to music and making calls while I work.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Why I Dont Like These
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate them. Have had then for only a couple hours and they are trash. Horrible sound quality, dont fit in my ears, barely fit in the carrying pouch, I hate them. They connect to my phone no problem but staying connected is another story. With my phone sitting 5 feet from me they have trouble staying connected. Hell, even in my pocket they have trouble staying connected. I fully charged them before I used them as well so it's not them running out of battery. Audio lag is just aweful on my Samsung Galaxy S8. I'm talking up to a second of lag. Just all around would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Bowler

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the build and sound is good as I expect from the AKG brand however, the fit is a bit quirky. I can't find the perfect size buds for my ears and there's nothing to hold it in place around the back of my neck.
customer_reviews.author: TiO

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: These worked great right out of the gate. I used them sparingly in the office for phone calls or to listen to music. I just tried to turn them on after working from home for 11 weeks and they will not even power on. I give a one rating because when the worked they were great, but not for only working minimally for 5 months. I am bummed because I am an Android lover and use the wired ear buds that came with my Note 8 so I choose these based on how good the wired ones work. Not worth the money for limited life.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth earbuds work great. They are not water proof, though. Have gotten sweat and splashed water on them. They still work. So far so good. Some people have said they sound horrible, no bass. But I think they sound fine to me. Maybe the other reviewer's didn't take time to try the different size ear pieces?
customer_reviews.author: Billy Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Very short battery life and do not use them in a hot environment
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for 5 weeks (I can no longer return them) and they have stopped working. They were great for the first 2 weeks, but the moment it got hotter outside and I had a little bit of sweat they broken and stopped working. If you want wireless headphones strictly for the office they might work, but the battery life is horrible. I used them for 1.5 hours and they died, they had to be charged again. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after about 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the sound quality with these. I gave it a low review because I got to use them about 6 times and they quit working. I can't turn them on, they won't charge, nothing. Dead. Also the micro USB is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Cleve

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: First order I received it with broken cover for the charge port. I exchanged and recieved a new one. I have had it less then a month and it will not keep a charge. I am completely unsatisfied with this product. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Montyy00001

customer_reviews.title: Zero customer service
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were great, but lasted a month and a half. The 1 star has more to do with the lack of customer service, i have msged Amazon cs, i was told to msg the seller, which proved pointless the seller didn't even bother to respond to tell me its past the 30 days window.
customer_reviews.author: steven r hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good but, won't connect to MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are good and I like them overall but, they don't work with my MacBook Pro. This is very frustrating because, I bought them primarily to use with my MacBook Pro. This is the only device that I own, that won't pair with my MacBook Pro or any MacBook for that matter. Even cheap devices pair but these wont... Very disappointing for the price. 🙁👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Pretty TONE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in less than 2 months. Will be contacting AKG direct for support. Also to note, I got these because they looked comparable to the ones that come with Galaxy phones. The sound quality on these are not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headphones i've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth headphones i have used so far. Highly highly recommended. I bought it when it was $99 and now i see the price is $57 ??? Very much worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: quit working
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds quit working after 6 months. NOBODY WILL REPLACE THEM. WASTE OF $100
customer_reviews.author: TRains1972

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but horrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good and they are comfortable, but the battery life is horrible. Needs to be charged every single day just for a couple hours of use. The way the charging port is designed is also pretty bad and there aren't many micro USB cords that will work with it other than the extremely short one that it came with. Only gets 3 stars because honestly, I am not very impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but came late
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds themselves are great. Sound quality is good, but can sound mushy during a call. The quality is great. Feels sturdy yet comfortable in my ears. At first I thought the wire that goes behind your neck will wobble while running, but the actually don’t move at all. My only major problem was the shipment. It took a little over a week to get to my house and I was really hoping that they would come on the date listed. But overall, if you just want wireless earbuds under $100, these are perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: AAron

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not quite what I expected and sound quality is good. It does drop people occasionally though. Much better than the lower cost alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight W.

customer_reviews.title: 1000% worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had the wired versions for years, loved those and now I cant get over how good the bluetooth ones are either, I absolutely think these are a steal for the price. As someone who has sold different headphones over the years, you get more then you pay for for the price. Good quality, good sound, very, very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Anne Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great but..
customer_reviews.text: Charger latch Disappeared after one month, the battery life is very bad It won’t last for five hours on full blast, (or 6 to 7 hours on medium sound level), The microphone on this headset is a piece of garbage, Also the headphones will make your ears feel sore after 3 hours of wearing them, the pros of these headphones is that the sound quality is superior also the charging time is good.
customer_reviews.author: ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Didn't hold a candle to my Boss. Sound is tinee, no bass. Considering returning, they are a waste of $90. Strongly recommend you not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mourer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the color ones is better than this black one
customer_reviews.text: It was not az good as I thought the one that has color is more flexible and easy to work and charge tha quality wasn't good either in first week I lost one part that conect to charge part
customer_reviews.author: Rose majdi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, for a low price but only a good battery life
customer_reviews.text: They have a excellent sound quality, for the price is perfect, but I honestly prefer more battery life, I only get 7.5 to 8 hours of battery, obviously that time translate to 3 to 5 days of charge but the AKG Y50BT have a better sound quality, more battery but the form factor is different.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain

customer_reviews.title: They're already broken
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is pretty good I guess. And the audio isnt too bad. And the noise cancelling is non-existent so much so that I feel like you could use. But I've had them a week and they're already broken. Pretty much garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: >1 year lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: 16 days before the one year mark and the wiring has gone to hell and the earbuds crackle and there's no sound coming out of the right bud. I was expecting better from akg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was missing my AKG not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I really was looking for this for a long time no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Ramon M.J

customer_reviews.title: Missing Bass
customer_reviews.text: If you really and really want to enjoy BASS then please consider to find other products. I do not know why AKG made this way...
customer_reviews.author: OH SOONG KWON

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but battery life stinks. Wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The microphone is not working the sound is very bad awful headphones I really miss the old Samsung headphones
customer_reviews.author: Shima Jalalian Sedaghati

customer_reviews.title: satisfyingly great product
customer_reviews.text: Have great sound quality it's one of the best experiences i've had with Bluetooth headphones and it's a positive one only complain is that rath short battery life only lasting me 2 days without a charge
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it the sound quality was horrible and it kept disconnect from my phone
customer_reviews.author: MARIE MCINTOSH

customer_reviews.title: BAD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these if you want something to last. Mine broke after just a few uses. Past time to return though - of course! Bad buy
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Elenbaas

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Never work since I got it. Some where it get disconcted.
customer_reviews.author: 3A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the long battery about this device. Love how durable it is. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hall

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Bad product very expensive and only wore for a week
customer_reviews.author: Manuel C.

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Could not get them to maintain a charge. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: Linda Charlip

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my Husband as gift he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how they're made. Very light, flexible. You will need to be careful with the charger port cover, not well placed. But the sound quality is TERRIBLE. I I have a Samsung S9 and I usually get a Samsung bluetooth but I did like how the U Flex is made, I've broken it twice because the earbud cords hang too long on me. Thought these would be a good replacement since Samsungs come with AKG headsets now but I can't stand the sound and it randomly disconnects. I just got them yesterday and I've already ordered a samsung headphone and started a return process.
customer_reviews.author: Sausha Kamara

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The wireless headphone design is comfortable. The buttons on the headphones work flawlessly. There isn't too much bass. Treble is pretty high. Would've liked the option to make sound adjustments. Overall the sound is nice and crisp. Battery life is very good lasts up to 8hrs. The charging port is thru a micro USB port. Overall the value of the headphones are just right. The portability of the headphones could be better. It's a little difficult to fold and put away when not in use. There's a small pouch that comes with the headphones. It's a bit of challenge to fold and carry in there. Thanks to the insidersnet.com for allowing me to review these headphones. #AKGInsiders #TheInsidersUS
customer_reviews.author: Gojess80

customer_reviews.title: Very balanced, quality sound once you get them fitted to your ears.
customer_reviews.text: Very balanced and Detailed sound! Bass hits hard enough to feel, while not overpowering the vocals or details. I've tried nearly every genre of music, and have loved the sound of each. Perfect for someone who listens to a wide range of music styles. Call quality is good as well, no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gargone

customer_reviews.title: Multi-point works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for the multi-point Bluetooth feature as I carry both a personal and work phone daily. This works pretty well as I'm often listening to a podcast on one phone when I get a call on the other. Battery life is usually enough to laate all day with moderate use. I can't really speak to sound quality as I'm a poor judge of it and rarely listen to music
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: i regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt buy this product! The range is very low and it make impossible to over around with the phone or music cutting off due to being out of range of your cell phone. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road earphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a good wireless option to the AKG earbuds that came with my Samsung. The volume adjustment is a little hard to find, especially when wearing gloves while riding a bike. And taking calls is little cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hunkins

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: You get more than what you pay for. The sound is better than any other same price headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Nurur Mamun

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with clear signs it was not a new product. The outside of the box was banged up and the internal packaging showed signs of wear, and stickers covering buttons were peeling off. I've yet to opperate the earbuds to see battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with a very good battery life
customer_reviews.author: jesus manuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Quality packaging, easy to pair with any device. Great sound quality (even better than the pair of AKG headphones that come with the newer Galaxy phones) and great build quality as they seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Avendano

customer_reviews.title: Hardly notice u have them on.
customer_reviews.text: In this price range, they're hard to beat. Fairly comfortable and I wear them all day
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing the bass is good and the battery last a long time. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the earphones; cheaper than totally wireless Galaxy buds with the same performance
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great item, glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease and functionality of these headphones. Easy to store in it's own little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Trini

product_meta.title: AKG Y100 Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds - Black (US Version)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackYour playlist never sounded so perfect in so many places. The wireless AKG Y100 earphones bring you crisp, clean sound wherever you go with a design so light you’ll forget you’re wearing them. Get lost in the music without losing touch with what’s around you on the train, at work or while you’re wandering around the city. Easily switch from streaming to taking calls. And with a long lasting battery, it’s the only pair of headphones you’ll need all day.
feature_bullets: Comfortable, durable design : An ergonomic neckband crafted from soft, flexible materials adapts to the shape of your neck, so you can wear it all day
Multi Point Connectivity : Pair two Bluetooth devices at once and your headphones will intuitively switch between devices
Long lasting battery/speed charge : Get up to eight hours of playback on a single charge so you can listen all day at work
Speed charge : 15 minute recharge will add another hour of music to get you through your commute

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars263 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 3 Size ear tips, Carrying pouch, Micro USB charging cable
